import React,{useState}from"react";import{Link,useNavigate}from"react-router-dom";import{FontAwesomeIcon}from"@fortawesome/react-fontawesome";import{faShoppingCart,faUser}from"@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons";import"./Header.css";// Đảm bảo bạn đã tạo file CSS này
import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Header=()=>{const[activeLink,setActiveLink]=useState(null);const[searchQuery,setSearchQuery]=useState("");const navigate=useNavigate();// Hàm để khi người dùng click vào một liên kết, highlight liên kết đó
const handleLinkClick=link=>{setActiveLink(link);};// Hàm tìm kiếm
const handleSearch=()=>{console.log("Tìm kiếm với từ khóa:",searchQuery);};// Điều hướng đến trang đăng nhập khi người dùng click vào icon người dùng
const handleUserClick=()=>{navigate("/login");};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"header-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"logo-search-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"logo-header",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"MyLogo"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"search-bar",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"T\xECm ki\u1EBFm...",value:searchQuery,onChange:e=>setSearchQuery(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleSearch,children:"T\xECm ki\u1EBFm"})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"navbar-header-link",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:`navbar-header-home ${activeLink==="home"?"active":""}`,onClick:()=>handleLinkClick("home"),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/",children:"Trang ch\u1EE7"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:`navbar-header-about ${activeLink==="about"?"active":""}`,onClick:()=>handleLinkClick("about"),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/about",children:"Gi\u1EDBi thi\u1EC7u"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:`navbar-header-contact ${activeLink==="contact"?"active":""}`,onClick:()=>handleLinkClick("contact"),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/contact",children:"Li\xEAn h\u1EC7"})})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"navbar-header-container3",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"cart",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/cart",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FontAwesomeIcon,{icon:faShoppingCart,className:"cart-icon"})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"user-icon",onClick:handleUserClick,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FontAwesomeIcon,{icon:faUser,className:"user-icon-style"})})]})]});};export default Header;
